name: Gravity Leo
description: Gravity Leo is a 2D platformer based on interesting mechanics and features, the main one of them is the use of gravity.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows  7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (or equivalent) Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX9 Compatible GPU with 512 MB Video RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 80 MB available space
